name: Car Parking: Police Office Car
description:
Car Parking: Police Office Car are specially designed for the lovers of multi-level police car parking games, new parking games and Dr Parking free games. Police car parking adventure games gives allege as a police suit uniform officer and trapped all the traffic law breakers and city car theft by using mobile police parking 3d cop vehicles with best Dr Parking and parking skills.
Highlights:

• Police Car Parking contains different auto stopping missions
• HD design with a reasonable domain
• Different Game levels with stopping obstacles
• Free Customization of 3D autos
• Realistic auto controls, directing wheel, brake and rigging
